Package camzup.pfriendly

Class Up3

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
processing.core.PGraphics
processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
camzup.pfriendly.UpOgl
camzup.pfriendly.Up3
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITextDisplay, ITextDisplay2, IUp, IUp3, IUpOgl, java.lang.Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Yup3, Zup3
public abstract class Up3
extends UpOgl
implements IUpOgl, IUp3, ITextDisplay2
An abstract parent class for 3D renderers.

  • Method Details

    • ambientLight

      public void ambientLight()
      Initializes an ambient light with the default ambient color. The camera's look target is used as the location. Ambient light illuminates an object evenly from all sides.

    • ambientLight

      public void ambientLight​(Color clr)
      Initializes an ambient light with a color. The camera's look target is used as the location. Ambient light illuminates an object evenly from all sides.
      Parameters:
      clr - the color

      Parameters:
      clr - the color
      loc - the location

    • dolly

      public void dolly​(float z)
      Dollies the camera, moving it on its local z axis, backward or forward. This is done by multiplying the z magnitude by the camera inverse, then adding the local coordinates to the camera location and look target.
      Specified by:
      dolly in interface IUp3
      Parameters:

    • pedestal

      public void pedestal​(float y)
      Boom or pedestal the camera, moving it on its local y axis, up or down. This is done by multiplying the y magnitude by the camera inverse, then adding the local coordinates to both the camera location and look target.
      Specified by:
      pedestal in interface IUp3
      Parameters:
      y - the y magnitude

    • spotLight

      public void spotLight​(Color clr, Vec3 loc, Vec3 dir, float angle, float concentration)
      Initializes a spot light. The location positions the spotlight in space while the direction determines where the light points. The angle parameter affects angle of the spotlight cone, while concentration sets the bias of light focusing toward the center of that cone.
      Parameters:
      clr - the color
      loc - the location
      dir - the direction
      angle - the angle
      concentration - cone center bias

    • spotLight

      public void spotLight​(int clr, float xLoc, float yLoc, float zLoc, float xDir, float yDir, float zDir, float angle, float concentration)
      Initializes a spot light. The location positions the spotlight in space while the direction determines where the light points. The angle parameter affects angle of the spotlight cone, while concentration sets the bias of light focusing toward the center of that cone.
      Parameters:
      clr - the color
      xLoc - the location x
      yLoc - the location y
      zLoc - the location z
      xDir - the direction x
      yDir - the direction y
      zDir - the direction z
      angle - spotlight cone angle
      concentration - cone center bias

    • spotLight

      public void spotLight​(int clr, Vec3 loc, Vec3 dir, float angle, float concentration)

      Parameters:

      angle - the angle
